| History                 = The Double Jade Clan was established by [[Shirohana (Earth-616)|Pale Flower]], after the annihilation of her [[Dai Kumo (Earth-616)|father]]'s Yakuza clan by [[James Howlett (Earth-616)|Wolverine]]. It's a syndicate based in Tokyo, and one of their criminal enterprises is illegal gambling.

Wolverine who was being hunted by the Japanese army, sought sanctuary in their casino. Only to have Pale Flower try to poison him, after which the army raided the casino.{{r|Wolverine Vol 2 107}} Wolverine and Pale Flower ended up in jail, after which a [[Hand (Earth-616)|Hand]] assassin attempted to kill Wolverine, at the cost of his life. Wolverine then left the jail with Pale Flower. Together they rescued [[Amiko Kobayashi (Earth-616)|Amiko]] from the Hand.{{r|Wolverine Vol 2 108|109}}
